fields.name: title
fields.description: title of the oral history

fields.name: contributor
fields.description: includes both interviewers and interviewees; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: publisher
fields.description: mostly empty but can include some publication details; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: date
fields.description: date the oral history was recorded; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: type
fields.description: for example `performed music`, `spoken word`; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: format
fields.description: for example `Sound recording`, `online resource`; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: extent
fields.description: usually number of files/reels/tapes, sometimes includes duration; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: language
fields.description: language of the recording; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: subject
fields.description: subjects of interview; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: spatial
fields.description: associated places (mostly using [Library of Congress geographic area codes](https://www.loc.gov/marc/geoareas/gacs_code.html)); multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: is_part_of
fields.description: collections or projects that this interview belongs to; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: library identifiers; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: rights
fields.description: copyright and licensing information; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: work_url
fields.description: link to work record in Trove; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: work_type
fields.description: Trove work format, for example `Sound/Interview, lecture, talk`; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: fulltext_url
fields.description: link to audio player (if digitised)

fields.name: fulltext_url_text
fields.description: text of link to audio player; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: catalogue_url
fields.description: link to NLA catalogue entry; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: summary
fields.description: text summary is available for download – `0` for no, `1` for yes

fields.name: transcript
fields.description: text transcript is available for download – `0` for no, `1` for yes

fields.name: sessions
fields.description: number of recording sessions

fields.name: duration
fields.description: total duration of recordings (in seconds)
